Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Three Mothers

The sky was grey and sweaty and three fat mothers talked and smoked. A little kid lay on the ground and played with the newest Nintendo toy and next to him a little child held an Apple iPad in his stroller. The wind brought the traffic stink to me and I felt relief a little colder.

Paging
